We previously committed to reassess in round 12 if no APPLY arrived from B/A/D, and as of round 11 none had applied. Given the long delay (12 rounds) and that higher-priority students’ preferences place School_C at: Student_B #2, Student_A #5, Student_D #5, it is increasingly unlikely they will apply here (especially A and D). Holding longer risks ending unmatched if E moves on or if the process ends. Student_E ranks School_C #1 and will commit immediately, providing a secure match. Accepting E now is consistent with our stated reassessment point and maximizes payoff versus remaining empty, even though E is not top-tier on our list.
